p: Transcriptomes from individual Anopheles midguts infected with P. falciparum from a previous study ( Dahalan et al., 2019) were mapped to the P. falciparum v3 genome ( http://www.genedb.org/Homepage/Pfalciparum, October 2016) with HISAT2 (v 2.1.0) ( Kim et al., 2015) using hisat2 –rna-strandness RF –max-intronlen 5000 p 12. Reads were summed against transcripts using featureCounts in the Subread package (v 2.0.0) ( Liao et al., 2014) using featureCounts -p -t CDS -g transcript_id -s 2. Two samples that had fewer than 5,000 reads were removed.
